# hitachi_vsp_one_ports (Data Source)

Datasource to list ports in VSP One storage with optional filters.

## Example Usage

```terraform
#
# Hitachi VSP One Ports Retrieval (Filtered List)
#
# This section defines a data source block that retrieves a list of existing
# storage ports from the Hitachi Virtual Storage Platform One Block Administrator.
#
# The "hitachi_vsp_one_ports" data source supports filtering by protocol,
# allowing you to narrow results to specific port types (FC, iSCSI, NVME_TCP).
# This is useful for auditing, reporting, or referencing existing ports in
# Terraform configurations.
#
# You can specify optional filtering parameters such as:
#   - protocol to target specific port types (FC, ISCSI, NVME_TCP)
#
# Adjust the parameters to fit your environment and query requirements.
#

##############
# Example without protocol filter for all ports
data "hitachi_vsp_one_ports" "ports" {
  serial = 12345
}

output "all_ports_info" {
  description = "Information about all ports"
  value       = data.hitachi_vsp_one_ports.ports.ports_info
}

output "all_ports_count" {
  description = "Total number of ports returned"
  value       = data.hitachi_vsp_one_ports.ports.port_count
}

##############
# Example with protocol filter for FC ports only
data "hitachi_vsp_one_ports" "fc_ports" {
  serial   = 12345
  protocol = "FC"
}

output "fc_ports_info" {
  description = "Information about FC ports only"
  value       = data.hitachi_vsp_one_ports.fc_ports.ports_info
}

output "fc_ports_count" {
  description = "Number of FC ports"
  value       = data.hitachi_vsp_one_ports.fc_ports.port_count
}

##############
# Example with protocol filter for iSCSI ports only
data "hitachi_vsp_one_ports" "iscsi_ports" {
  serial   = 12345
  protocol = "iSCSI"
}

output "iscsi_ports_info" {
  description = "Information about iSCSI ports only"
  value       = data.hitachi_vsp_one_ports.iscsi_ports.ports_info
}

output "iscsi_ports_count" {
  description = "Number of iSCSI ports"
  value       = data.hitachi_vsp_one_ports.iscsi_ports.port_count
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `serial` (Number) Serial number of storage

### Optional

- `ports_info` (Block List) List of ports. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--ports_info))
- `protocol` (String) Filter ports by protocol. Valid values: FC, iSCSI, NVME_TCP.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `port_count` (Number) Number of ports returned.

<a id="nestedblock--ports_info"></a>
### Nested Schema for `ports_info`

Optional:

- `actual_port_speed` (String) Actual port speed.
- `fc_information` (Block List) Fibre Channel information. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--ports_info--fc_information))
- `id` (String) Port ID.
- `iscsi_information` (Block List) iSCSI information. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--ports_info--iscsi_information))
- `port_iscsi_name` (String) Port iSCSI name.
- `port_security` (Boolean) Port security setting.
- `port_speed` (String) Port speed.
- `port_wwn` (String) Port World Wide Name.
- `protocol` (String) Port protocol.

Read-Only:

- `nvme_tcp_information` (Block List) NVMe-TCP information. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--ports_info--nvme_tcp_information))

<a id="nestedblock--ports_info--fc_information"></a>
### Nested Schema for `ports_info.fc_information`

Optional:

- `al_pa` (String) Arbitrated Loop Physical Address.
- `connection_type` (String) Connection type.
- `fabric_switch_setting` (Boolean) Fabric switch setting.
- `port_mode` (String) Port mode.
- `sfp_data_transfer_rate` (String) SFP data transfer rate.


<a id="nestedblock--ports_info--iscsi_information"></a>
### Nested Schema for `ports_info.iscsi_information`

Optional:

- `vlan_use` (Boolean) VLAN usage setting.

Read-Only:

- `delayed_ack` (Boolean) Delayed ACK setting.
- `ip_mode` (String) IP mode setting.
- `ipv4_information` (Block List) IPv4 information. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--ports_info--iscsi_information--ipv4_information))
- `ipv6_information` (Block List) IPv6 information. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--ports_info--iscsi_information--ipv6_information))
- `is_ipv6_updating` (Boolean) IPv6 updating status.
- `isns_server_ip_address` (String) iSNS server IP address.
- `isns_server_mode` (Boolean) iSNS server mode setting.
- `isns_server_port` (Number) iSNS server port number.
- `keep_alive_timer` (Number) Keep alive timer setting.
- `link_mtu_size` (String) Link MTU size.
- `mtu_size` (String) MTU size.
- `selective_ack` (Boolean) Selective ACK setting.
- `tcp_port` (Number) TCP port number.
- `virtual_port_enabled` (Boolean) Virtual port enabled setting.
- `vlan_id` (Number) VLAN ID.
- `window_size` (String) TCP window size.
